meanings.definition: To make small decorative additions to something.
meanings.sent1: She titivates her desk with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The artist titivates the painting with intricate details.
meanings.sent3: He titivates his phone case with glittery gems.
meanings.sent4: Her smile titivates the room like a burst of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The garden titivates the backyard with blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: To make small improvements to something in order to make it more attractive.
meanings.sent1: The chef titivates the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent2: She titivates her outfit with a stylish scarf.
meanings.sent3: He titivates his speech with a touch of humor.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight titivates the night sky with its gentle glow.
meanings.sent5: The fresh coat of paint titivates the old house beautifully.
